entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning in the evening then changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
